title: Capulin Volcano National Monument: Work With Us
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Work With Us             Work With Us      Capulin Volcano may have permanent positions available occasionally. These jobs will be listed on the Office of Personnel Management website as they become available.   Seasonal positions are usually available in the summer months in the maintenance and interpretation divisions. These jobs may be listed on the Office of Personnel Management website usually beginning in February or March each year.    Student interns may be hired through the Student Conservation Association (SCA) or the Geologist in Park program through the Geological Society of America.   Local high school and college students may apply for the Public Land Crew positions by contacting the monument.   For more information, contact the monument at (575) 278-2201 or email us.
